activities: We only collect private information that a customer or potential customer voluntarily provides us. In cases where necessary, AirWatch collects certain information that is necessary to fully service a customer's AirWatch account and allow the customer to fully utilize the capabilities of the AirWatch proprietary software if and where AirWatch hosts the software. Customers may be asked to provide information that is needed in order to create their AirWatch account and fulfill our service commitment to such customer: name, address, phone number, and e-mail address. We treat any personal information that a customer provides to us as highly confidential. AirWatch may use this personal information for editorial and feedback purposes, marketing and promotional purposes, for statistical analysis and for product development. Personal information, however, will never be sold to any company nor will it be shared with third parties, unless specifically stated otherwise or as required by law.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: On-line, Manually processed and Human resources data
